biotools.summary: This tool provides BPCA, PPCA and NipalsPCA that can be used to perform PCA on incomplete data as well as for accurate missing value estimation. A set of methods for printing and plotting the results is also provided. All PCA methods make use of the same data structure to provide a common interface to the PCA results.

bioschemas.name: pcaMethods
